title: Audit Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) Reporting
description: An auditor reviews the data and processes used to create the company's annual ESG report.

tasks.description: Select a key metric from the ESG report, such as 'Total Greenhouse Gas Emissions'.
tasks.expected_outcome: A metric is chosen for testing.

tasks.description: Obtain the underlying data from the source systems (e.g., utility bills, fuel usage data) used to calculate the metric.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor has the source data.

tasks.description: Recalculate the metric and compare it to the amount published in the ESG report to ensure its accuracy.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor confirms the reported metric is accurate and supported by the underlying data.
